en-US.summary: Control Lionel TMCC and Legacy Engines, Trains, and Equipment by voice.
en-US.name: My Layout
en-US.description:
The My Layout skill allows you to control your Lionel TMCC/Legacy layout using your voice! You can throw switches, fire routes, and control engines and trains all with voice commands. Examples of engine and train operations include:

* Start up Train 53
* Accelerate Train 53 to speed step 35
* Reverse Train 5
* Ring the bell on Engine 10
* Stop Train 35
* Set the smoke level on engine 6 to low
 * Emergency Halt

The My Layout skill is powered by PyTrain. It talks with a computer on your local network running the PyTrain Api and accessible via HTTP or HTTPS. For information on how to install and configure the PyTrain Api, please visit github.com/cdswindell/PyTrainApi.
en-US.updatesDescription: Persist last engine/train number so you don't have to repeat it every time; it is reset when you say 'Alexa, Launch My Layout' or 'Alexa, Open My Layout'
